name: @ngnjs/libcrypto
description: A simple cryptography plugin for NGN.
author: Corey Butler

scripts.test: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests
scripts.build: npm run clean && quikdev-js build --pack --external crypto --external os --outdir ./.dist/@ngnjs/libcrypto
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform browser --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests
scripts.test:node: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform node --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests
scripts.test:deno:old: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests
scripts.test:jwt:deno: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno@1.25.3 --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests/05-jwt.js
scripts.test:jwt:node: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform node --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests/05-jwt.js
scripts.test:jwt:node:old: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform node@15.0.0 --verbose --output pretty --external crypto --external os --sourcemap --entry ./tests/05-jwt.js
scripts.test:deno:sanity: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --external crypto --external os --entry ./tests/*-sanity.js --verbose --output pretty --sourcemap
scripts.test:deno:signing: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --external crypto --external os --entry ./tests/*-signing.js --verbose --output pretty --sourcemap
scripts.test:deno:encryption: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --external crypto --external os --entry ./tests/*-encryption.js --verbose --output pretty --sourcemap
scripts.test:deno:otp: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --external crypto --external os --entry ./tests/*-otp.js --verbose --output pretty --sourcemap
scripts.test:deno:jwt: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --external crypto --external os --entry ./tests/*-jwt.js --verbose --output pretty --sourcemap
scripts.test:deno: npm run build && quikdev-js test --platform deno --external crypto --external os --entry ./tests/*.js --verbose --output pretty --sourcemap
scripts.old:xtest: npm run test:node && npm run test:deno && npm run test:browser && npm run report:syntax && npm run report:size
scripts.old:report:preview: npm pack --dry-run && echo "==============================" && echo "This report shows what will be published to the module registry. Pay attention to the tarball contents and assure no sensitive files will be published."
